p: A recent published document (AIOM, CIPOMO) for COVID-19 emergency indicates the need to postpone the follow-up outpatient activities for disease-free patients (e.g., follow-up to 6- 12 months), providing a telephone triage and/or telematic patient rescheduling based on clinical severity ( 17). This indication opens the opportunity to apply telemedicine methodologies in emergency situations such as the current one but also in the post-emergency phase.
